oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Henry Knox
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Portrait of Henry Knox (1750-1806), in Revolutionary War uniform, standing in a fort setting with artillery and an American flag behind him.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military officers; Cannons; Forts & fortifications; Uniforms
Knox, Henry, 1750-1806
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Major General, American Revolution; first U.S. Secretary of War.
